message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I've already come down to $160 and then $155. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $155, so I'll offer it to you for $147.50. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not sure about $147.50. I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and $147.50, so I'll offer it to you for $141.25. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not sure about $141.25. I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
